pages.text:
Column one
About Us at Lake Letta RV Park
Dedicated to Community, Comfort, and Care
Our 55+ community is dedicated to providing you with a safe, secure, and comfortable stay whether you’re a full-time resident or vacation guest.
Column one
More Than Just a Place to Stay
With a beautiful location in Avon Park, FL, Lake Letta RV Park is more than just a place to stay. It’s a place to thrive!
Experience scenic lakeside beauty with our well-manicured grounds, attention to cleanliness, and spacious packed gravel sites with concrete pads. Explore the local area with surrounding state parks, lakeside trails, delicious restaurants, and exciting entertainment. Or simply join one of our very own community activities at our onsite clubhouse! Lake Letta RV Park is designed around comfort, connection, and care.
Column one
Our Dedication to Safety
With a dedicated onsite staff and management, our 55+ community offers safety, security, and convenience. Our fenced and gated community also has security cameras for that extra level of comfort.
Column one
73
Full-Service Sites
4.7
Miles from Sebring

Days of Paradise
